description_text:
Hi,

I am writing to you regarding my Simsonn X Plus pedals, which I recently
purchased from amazon. While I was very satisfied at first, I am now
experiencing a serious issue with the throttle pedal.

The problems are as follows:

Random Disconnections: The throttle pedal disconnects frequently during use.

Physical Sensitivity: I have to "tweak" or wiggle the cable connection for
it to work temporarily, and when I do it sometimes shows 100% without a
physical input on the pedal.

Reconnecting the cable doesn't always fix the issue; the signal remains
erratic.

I have already tried recalibrating and ensuring the cables are seated, but
the problem persists. Since this seems to be a hardware or connection issue
could you please advise on a solution?

Best regards,

conversations.body_text: Hi Abdallah Sarre,  Please take a clear photo of the throttle pedal connector and send it to us for inspection. If an issue is confirmed, we will send you a replacement throttle pressure sensor for installation.
